title: Citi Panama Inaugurates Its Sixteenth Branch in Panamá Pacífico
summary: Panama City, Panama - Citi Panama inaugurated its 16th branch in Panamá Pacífico, serving the many multinational and maritime clients based in this fast-growing development project.
tag-1: Citi Panama Inaugurates Its Sixteenth Branch in Panamá Pacífico
tag-3: Panama City, Panama – Citi Panama inaugurated its 16th branch in Panamá Pacífico, serving the many multinational and maritime clients based in this fast-growing development project.
tag-4: "The new branch is part of our efforts to strengthen our corporate banking positioning in Panama. After 109 years in Panama, today we can say that we are the only global bank present in all of Central America, representing important value added to the multinationals we serve," remarked Raymond Gatcliffe, General Manager of Citi Panama.
tag-5: Starting in April, the new Panamá Pacífico branch will also offer consumer client services, including credit and debit cards, savings and checking accounts, online banking, personal loans and insurance. ATM and telephone banking services will also be featured.
tag-6: In addition to its 16 branches offering One Bank services, Citi Panama has three corporate banking branches and three customer service kiosks in the interior of the country.
tag-7: Citi held a simple opening event to announce the official inauguration of the new branch. Regional clients and bank employees attended, as well as special guest Henry Kardonski, Managing Director of London & Regional, the main developer of the Panamá Pacífico project.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
